attributes.action: To give the people a 'Deal or No Deal' vote on exiting the European Union.
attributes.additional_details:
At this critical point in time for our nation, it is clear that this vote would be the 'silver bullet' that 'Brexit' requires - it would:
- encourage the EU to finally offer the UK the very best deal that it is able to do so (for fear of a 'no deal')
- stop politicians squabbling and focus them on the bigger picture
- move everybody on from the original debate and unite (as much as it is possible) the 52% & the 48% to the common good
- ensure that all start explaining their positions to voters
attributes.background:
Democracy and the true will of the people should decide this most difficult of subjects.
This nation belongs to its people: 
- it is 'our £40 billion' being offered
- it is our economy and society that will change
So, IT MUST BE US THAT DECIDES!
